item.description:
Something a little different on the 15th. The Boston Cards and Conversation group (http://meetup.com/Bos...) will be joining us at the Cafe Paradiso in the North End for an evening of Italian conversation, Briscola and Scopa.

If you have an Italian card deck, please bring it along, and if you know how to play the games please come and help teach. If you don't know how to play, you can find instructions here:

http://www.meetup.com...'

l'll see you there.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: June 15 Boston Italian Meetup
